title: Time Wraith Zilean
body: Since my post with Project: Mordekaiser went so well, I decided to make another skin. This time Zilean, again because I'm trying to find champions who haven't had a skin in a while. This time I wanted to do my own idea instead of a already existing kind. Hope you all like it.

replies.body:
This is awesome!

You are incredibly talented and you obviously work pretty fast... would you at all be interested in doing any concept art for a couple of my champion concepts?  You can check out my [Mega Thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/uuQxluoH-lutzburgs-champion-concepts-mega-thread?show=flat&page=1) to see what kinds of concepts I create.  :)

> [{quoted}](name=Lutzburg,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=50jvQWr8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-12T07:26:42.592+0000)
>
> This is awesome!
> 
> You are incredibly talented and you obviously work pretty fast... would you at all be interested in doing any concept art for a couple of my champion concepts?  You can check out my [Mega Thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/uuQxluoH-lutzburgs-champion-concepts-mega-thread?show=flat&page=1) to see what kinds of concepts I create.  :)

Thanks, and sure I'll check it out some time.

This is a better representation of the Grim Reaper than Grim Reaper Karthus. Everyone seems to leave out the hourglass. Anyways +1000000 I love it love it love it, and your project mordekaiser design. I'd love to see them implement these skins or even consider them. You're a very talented artist, i wish i had that kind of ability. Not only do i like it, i LOVE it. Would be a great skin to be released this year's harrowing. I really hope someone from Riot will see this and pass it onto the art team for consideration :)
What do you use to make these?
Photoshop CS5 and a Wacom Intuos Tablet
I'm a big fan of the art, just not of the theme. Looking forward to more of your work, though!
I want to see bizzaro zilean.... I picture a giant grandfather clock carrying a crazed looking little zilean on his back, lol Whats wrong with a little role reversal, lol!?
Well reverse Annie would suggest you're not wrong.
Ultimate/1350 RP skin please, would instabuy.
That looks so great! I would have no choice but to shell out thousands of RP for this...
That... would be a sick looking skin. :)
Awesome! Zilean screwed up his clock and died, now he's trapped in a state of animated death forever. I would get zilean just so I could get this skin!
It's about time he'd get a darker themed skin anyway, this would be awesome.
YOO I LIKE IT I PLAY ZIL ALL THE TIME! and also see my sivir skiin as well!

> [{quoted}](name=Lutzburg,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=50jvQWr8,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-12T07:38:24.738+0000)
>
> Uh, having trouble deleting comments?  :D

Yeah it was acting weird. But I fixed it lol.

>
> Yeah it was acting weird. But I fixed it lol.

Yeah these forums are still VERY much in "beta."  It's very frustrating.  If you don't already, I strongly recommend you copy all of your text before you hit Post.
